A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie starts with misplaced MCU humor on the first scene\, then just disregards every new thing introduced in TFA\, and lastly just feels like an emotionless movie with generic messages and action pieces. This would pass as an animated children movie\, didn't work for me at all. Also it shows that there is no major arcing plan for this trilogy and they are winging it. Will not see ep 9 in the cinemas after this.
